sub_title: Open the gates to the world for your business.
summary:
Currently working as a freelance copywriter to help my European clients reach out the Chinese market and their potential target audience through creative contents. I mainly write for clients' Wechat public accounts. Moreover, I also take care of other social media platforms, such as Zhihu, Tiktok, and Toutiao, and etc. 

Some marketing copy examples as follow: 

1)《中国教育体系大改革，德国教育模式有什么可参考的吗？》https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/IWynPvLvnw_0bN3XAd8K_g 

2)《德语真的有那么烫嘴吗？》https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/0iEXHbEvCO7_8uumnsWmhQ

3) 《放下手中的瓜，一起来追德国爆款》https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/pHr_PBURYoC5sA0Os4_o8g

In the past 10 years, I have been a self-motivated young professional whom focuses on business development and global account/project management. After my study in China, the U.S. and the Netherlands, I have been working with cross-cultural teams to initiate international trade projects, open the door for consulting business and coordinate project teams to provide talent development service/solutions systematically as a lead. With my current role at Schouten China, besides global account management and business development, I also partly focus on developing new channels and partnership all over China to expand the business and re-new the business model of the company.

treasury_media.title: Best Deal Closer

profile_positions.description:
From manufacture to your own warehouse, or your digital platform to the end customer, New Hanyuan creates solutions that meets your specifics needs and business strategy.

As a daughter company of New Hanyuan International Group, New Hanyuan Logistics Europa B.V. is rooted in the Netherlands. We provide our clients comprehensive freight services at a global scale. Find more info from the website of New Hanyuan International Group: www.newhanyuan.com 

For more information of New Hanyuan Europe, please check our website: www.newhanyuan.eu
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
Knowlephant has two major focuses. 

1. online digital consulting, which involves APP and platform design and full-stack build-up for our clients. 

2. offline business consulting, which covers international business, cross-cultural partnership and channel build-up. 

As co-founder of Knowlephant and a senior consultant, I am in charge of the offline business consulting category. I am working with my clients from all over the world to expand their business scope and advice & coach them regarding cultural differences to smooth business cooperation and build up long-term business partnership with foreign partners and agencies. I don't limit my knowledge to certain industries. So far, I have helped clients from industries such as, education, technology, telecommunication, manufacturing and publishing and etc. successfully develop their business and partnership in Europe and China. I look forward to co-working with many more clients with various backgrounds and demands!

profile_positions.description: I work as an editor and translator for CNKI's international publishing. Based on my education background, I focus on all the academic articles in international relations and general sociology fields, which need to be edited, translated and published from Chinese to English on various well-known academic magazines.
profile_positions.title: Editor/Translator

profile_positions.description:
Through unique products/services selecting, extensive communicating and end-to-end project landing, we play the role as exclusive agent to support foreign high-tech companies to effectively develop both business and strong partnership in China.   

My current role is to initiate and execute business plans between the European clients and the mother company.

profile_positions.description: Etheria Consulting is your partner for maximising the benefit of the SDN/NFV world. Using this as the underlying technology, we architect; design; develop and integrate solutions that enable Service Providers (fixed or mobile) to orchestrate their e2e service delivery.

company.name: Travelling in South China & South East Asia

profile_positions.company: Travelling in South China & South East Asia
profile_positions.description: After being with Schouten China for 3.5 years, I have been empowered to dream bigger for a bigger game! The experience of living and working in North America and Europe has inspired me to explore more about Asia (at least a part of it) further. For sure, more inspiration and creativity will bump up during the journey. To be continued!
profile_positions.title: Dream Follower and Go-Catcher
New Business & Partnerships Executive

profile_positions.description:
Company introduction
"A ship is as strong as its crew" quote by founder and owner of Schouten Global. 

SNR Schouten Global is an international organisation which leads,monitors and supports a group of institues. The head office of SNR Schouten Global is in the Netherlands (Zaltbommel). We also have branches in Belgium, Germany, Switzerland, Russia, Poland and China. Through the institutes, SNR Schouten Global serves a wide range of different clients-worldwide-in various branches and sectors.

Schouten China helps organizations to release and align the potential of individuals, teams and organizations. We build capacity and stimulate learning that is grounded in the real work environment and results in new ways of thinking and acting.

Chang has been recognized as 2014 Best Deal Closer-top sales performer of Schouten China
profile_positions.title: Business Development Executive

profile_positions.description:
-Mainly focus on financial industry, the responsibilities which include KA clients’ maintenance, market research, client identification, client visit, negotiation and contract signing. 
-Plan, execute, analyze and review the client satisfaction survey or research and provide feedback report.
-Develop and execute CRM tactics and strategy.
-Attend exhibitions and conferences to promote and market VKCON China 
-Successfully developed and signed 10 new contracts in the first half year.

As a worldwide recruiting expert, VKCON powers the world by providing professional recruiting services and truly understanding our clients and candidates-locally and globally. Our offices now locate in Boston | New York | Chicago | San Francisco | Houston | Miami | London | Paris | Hong Kong | Shanghai | Mumbai | Singapore | Sydney. To get to know more about what we providing, please view our official website: www.vkcon.com
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
-Co-organized with the Ministry of Economic Affairs, Agriculture and Innovation of the Netherlands to hold the FTA between Korea and EU seminar (invited the former Dutch Prime-Minister Mr. Jan Peter Balkenende as a keynote speaker)

-Co-organized with Holland Gateway to hold a seminar for the participants of CPA outgoing mission to China: how to do business with Chinese businessmen?

-Organized Wenzhou Seminar at Chamber of Commerce of The Hague; helped translate the whole conference.   

-Being responsible of administration of the Dutch Imports Expo & Trade Center Program between Shanghai and the Netherlands, translated official LOI, MOU and contract, from Chinese to English. 

-Assisted EVD to organize the Press Conference of contract signing between Dutch and Chinese enterprises on the Trade Dinner for receiving Chinese President Mr. Qinglin Jia in the Netherlands in 2011; 

-Organized immigration & labor law seminar for Chinese Entrepreneurs in the Netherlands; invited the representatives of the Shanghai United Assets and Equity Exchange as keynote speakers.  

-Preparing elderly care outgoing mission to China; cooperating with the governments of Shanghai and Nanjing; translated the program from English/Dutch to Chinese; 
	
-Co-organized matchmaking trade event for Korean enterprises with Amsterdam Chamber of Commerce and Dutch Korea Trade Club in May 2012;

-Built and designed the Chinese website for the China Chamber of NCH: www.nchchinachamber.nl 

-Cooperated with the most influential Chinese newspaper and online forum in the Netherlands to promote NCH China Chamber and its partners regularly.
